entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
